Caustic
export namespace
Caustic
ImageFilterParams

Parameters used by image filters when Apply() is called

Members
<CRefObj < IImage > > spMask

per pixel mask indicating which pixels have the filter applied. Values > 0 have the filter applied.

<std::map< std::string, std::any> > params

parameters specific to a filter type

Module

import Imaging.Image.ImageFilter

IImageFilter

Interface for objects that apply some sort of filter on a IImage

Module

import Imaging.Image.ImageFilter

Functions
Apply
virtual CRefObj<IImage> Apply(
IImage* 
pImage,
ImageFilterParams* 
pParams
) = 0

Applies the filter to the specified image.

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to apply filter to

pParams
ImageFilterParams*

list of parameters used by the specific filter

Returns

Returns a new image with the filter applied

ApplyInPlace
virtual bool ApplyInPlace(
IImage* 
pImage,
ImageFilterParams* 
pParams
) = 0

Similar to the Apply method except the filter is applied in place on the original image.

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to apply filter to

pParams
ImageFilterParams*

list of parameters used by the specific filter

Returns

True if filter supports in place application. False otherwise.
